Topic.Title: Can't change game from "Work in Progress"

Posts.EditableText: Whenever I go into my game listing and change the "is it finished" to ready for release instead of work in progress, when I click update it still says work in progress. Is there any way to fix this??
Posts.HTML: Whenever I go into my game listing and change the "is it finished" to ready for release instead of work in progress, when I click update it still says work in progress. Is there any way to fix this??

Posts.EditableText:
> Do you want to apply to put the game into a category?

You have to place your game in a category.
Posts.HTML:
Do you want to apply to put the game into a category?

You have to place your game in a category.
